mapper.select: SELECT b.id ,u.username ,b.blogtitle ,b.logofile FROM users u, blog b where u.id = b.id and b.id = #{id}

SELECT ctr.rn as num ,ctr.cateNo ,ctr.id ,(SELECT count(p.cateno) FROM blog b,category c,post p where b.id = c.id and c.cateno = p.cateno and b.id = #{id} and ctr.cateNo = c.cateNo) post ,ctr.catename ,ctr.description ,ctr.regdate FROM (SELECT rownum rn ,ct.cateNo ,ct.id ,ct.catename ,ct.description ,ct.regdate FROM (SELECT c.cateNo ,c.id ,c.catename ,c.description ,c.regdate FROM blog b,category c where b.id = c.id and b.id = #{id} ORDER BY c.cateno asc) ct) ctr

SELECT p.postno ,p.cateno ,c.cateName ,p.posttitle ,p.postcontent ,to_char(p.regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') regDate FROM blog b,category c,post p where b.id = c.id and c.cateno = p.cateno and b.id = #{id} and p.cateno =
(SELECT min(c.cateno) FROM blog b,category c,post p where b.id = c.id and c.cateno = p.cateno and b.id = #{id})
#{cate}
ORDER BY p.postno desc
SELECT c.cmtNo ,c.postNo ,c.userNo ,u.userName ,c.cmtContent ,to_char(c.regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') regDate FROM comments c, users u where c.userNo = u.userNo and c.postno = #{postNo}
